snippet: The gilded sculpture “Leonine Goddess” will be on public view for the first time in the Brooklyn Museum’s show “Divine Felines: Cats of Ancient Egypt.”
lead_paragraph: The gilded sculpture “Leonine Goddess” will be on public view for the first time in the Brooklyn Museum’s show “Divine Felines: Cats of Ancient Egypt.”

headline.main: A Big Litter of Ancient Cats
headline.print_headline: A Big Litter Of Ancient Cats
